metadata.feature_description: Post wiki activities to user and group activity journals

steps.action: Navigate to Community page and view activity feed
steps.expected: Activity feed should display wiki article journal entries
steps.actual: Activity feed shows multiple 'authored wiki article' entries including 'Draft Test Article - Jan 16 2026', 'Multiple Tags Test - Jan 16 2026', 'Single Tag Test - Jan 16 2026', 'Published Test Article - Jan 16 2026' and others with proper formatting (author, article title link, summary, timestamp, action links)

steps.action: Filter activity feed by 'Added to Wiki'
steps.expected: Only wiki-related journal entries should be displayed
steps.actual: Filter successfully shows only wiki journal entries with 'authored wiki article' format, displaying article titles, summaries, timestamps (9 minutes ago, 11 minutes ago, etc.), and action links (Like, Read More, Comment, Remove)

steps.action: View journal entries in activity feed
steps.expected: Journal entries should show article title, summary, author, timestamp, and action links
steps.actual: Journal entries correctly display: author name ('Anonymous'), 'authored wiki article' text, clickable article title link, article summary/preview, timestamp, and action links (Like, Read More, Comment, Remove). Comments can be added to journal entries.

steps.action: View filtered activity feed for group wiki entries
steps.expected: Group wiki journal entries should show group badge/icon
steps.actual: Group wiki journal entries are visible with 'Test Activity Group' badge displayed. Entries include articles like 'Group Mode Test Article - Jan 2026', 'Test Draft Article - Created by Claude', and others with proper group attribution.

observations: Code review (Journal.cs) confirms AddWikiToJournal() creates/updates journal entries when articles are created or edited
Code review (ContentController.cs) shows journal integration is called during article publish and title updates
Code review (RevisionsServiceController.cs) shows journal entries are updated when revision state changes
Activity feed filter dropdown includes 'Added to Wiki' and 'Updated Wiki' options confirming journal type registration
Journal entries support Like/Unlike, Comment, and Read More functionality
Group journal entries correctly show group badge and link to group wiki
